backend/main.mo: Actor implementing access‑controlled user profiles and read‑only phone/crypto report queries using Map storage.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence listing transparency‑related frontend changes, affected files, components, and requirement IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Reference list summarizing multiple frontend files and their roles in the project.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind‑based styles defining OKLCH color tokens and light/dark theme variables.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry point configuring metadata, icons, manifest, and app root element.
frontend/PHASE3A_READONLY_FRONTEND_NOCHA: Documentation confirming that Phase 3a introduces no frontend changes for the new read‑only database canister.
frontend/public/404.html: SPA fallback page that redirects known routes back to the application shell.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: PWA manifest defining metadata, icons, start URL, theme, and display settings.
frontend/public/service-worker.js: Service worker implementing basic caching with cache‑then‑network updates for the PWA.
frontend/PWA_WEBAPK_ANDROID_TEST.md: Manual checklist for testing WebAPK installation behavior on Android Chrome.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component wiring routing, PWA setup, consent gate, and layout using providers.
frontend/src/backend.idl.ts: Defines the backend canister interface with a single analyzeText function.
frontend/src/components/AppLayout.tsx: Provides the app’s main layout with navigation, header, mobile menu, and language/auth controls.
frontend/src/components/AuthControl.tsx: Handles Internet Identity login/logout UI and shows a profile dropdown when authenticated.
frontend/src/components/CollaborativeRes: Displays collaborative lookup results including risk score, categories, and error/loading states.
frontend/src/components/ConsentGateModal: Modal forcing users to accept cookies and terms before interacting with the app.
frontend/src/components/InstallButton.ts: Button that triggers PWA installation with a fallback alert if not eligible.
frontend/src/components/LanguageSelector: Language switcher dropdown allowing selection among multiple supported languages.
frontend/src/components/PwaInstallAction: Small button component to trigger PWA installation using localized text.
frontend/src/components/ReportSubmission: Dialog for submitting scam reports with validation, rate limiting, and success/error handling.
frontend/src/components/StructuredAnalys: UI card showing structured fraud analysis results with risk level, explanation, recommendation, sources, and collaborative basis.
User profile menu displaying identity info, history entries, and a logout option with localization support.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook creating and managing a backend actor tied to the user's identity, invalidating dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useAntiFraudActors.ts: Initializes and manages main, extra, and reports anti-fraud canister actors and logs a one-time readiness report.
frontend/src/hooks/useConsentGate.ts: Handles local consent state with versioning, determining whether user consent is required and allowing acceptance.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and hooks for managing Internet Identity login, stored identity loading, and authentication state.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserProfile.ts: Manages user-specific history stored per principal with add, load, and clear operations.
frontend/src/i18n/I18nProvider.tsx: I18n provider storing language in sessionStorage and exposing translations and language setter.
frontend/src/i18n/translations.ts: Provides Portuguese UI translation strings for navigation, documentation, consent modal, home page, verification, and analysis features.
frontend/src/ic/actors.ts: Creates DFINITY HttpAgent and typed canister actors for main, extra, and reports canisters using their IDL factories.
frontend/src/ic/canisterIds.ts: Defines hardcoded canister IDs and a helper to retrieve them by type.
frontend/src/ic/idl/extra.idl.ts: IDL and interface for the extra canister, exposing phone and crypto report lookup queries.
frontend/src/ic/idl/main.idl.ts: IDL and interface for the main canister, exposing a text analysis update method.
frontend/src/ic/idl/reports.idl.ts: IDL and interfaces for submitting reports and querying lookup data across multiple report types.
frontend/src/ic/readinessReport.ts: Generates and logs a readiness report checking actor availability and method presence for all canisters.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind setup defining light/dark theme variables, base styles, and accessibility-focused UI adjustments.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point setting up React root with query client and Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/pages/DocumentationPage.tsx: React page that displays documentation info and triggers PDF generation with translated UI text.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Main landing page with tabs to analyze messages, emails, phone numbers, and crypto addresses using fraud‑analysis utilities.
frontend/src/pages/HowItWorksPage.tsx: Explains verification methods using accordion sections and sets SEO metadata via translations.
frontend/src/pages/MissionPage.tsx: Renders mission, vision, values, and limitations content using translated text and SEO metadata.
frontend/src/pages/PrivacyPage.tsx: Displays privacy policy sections with translated text and SEO metadata.
frontend/src/pages/TermsPage.tsx: Shows terms and conditions sections with translated text and SEO metadata.
frontend/src/pwa/install.ts: Handles PWA install prompt events and exposes functions to trigger installation.
frontend/src/router/useSimpleRouter.ts: Implements a minimal client‑side router using history API and custom navigation events.
frontend/src/utils/antifraudTextNormaliz: Provides text normalization and keyword‑matching helpers for antifraud heuristics.
Defines the documentation structure and builds Portuguese institutional content using translation data.
frontend/src/utils/emailHeuristics.ts: Implements deterministic frontend email risk checks using domain, TLD, pattern, and formatting heuristics.
frontend/src/utils/generateDocumentation: Generates and downloads a text-based documentation file by assembling structured content into a formatted output.
frontend/src/utils/localRateLimit.ts: Provides a simple localStorage-based cooldown mechanism for rate-limiting submissions.
frontend/src/utils/messageHeuristics.ts: Scores messages for scam indicators using keyword weights, crypto detection, URL checks, and formatting heuristics.
frontend/src/utils/seo.ts: Sets document title and meta description for SPA pages with enforced branding.
frontend/src/utils/structuredFraudAnalys: Implements a structured heuristic fraud analysis engine with localized templates and indicator labeling.
frontend/src/utils/translateBackendResul: Performs dictionary-based translation of backend analysis text into multiple target languages.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL parameters (query or hash), persist them in sessionStorage, retrieve them later, and optionally clear them from the URL.
frontend/src/utils/userProfileStorage.ts: Manages user profile data in localStorage, including history items and preferred language, with functions to load, save, and clear profiles per principal.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining content paths, theming, colors, typography, animations, and container settings with plugin support.
project_state.json: Captures the project’s current state, architectural notes, issues, and PWA-related requirements for phased AntiFraud app development.
